Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Babylonia - Center of Basic Public Education - 9:00 am'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Here, and there. And then...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm, not bad. Just a bit more here...', 4: '1'}
{3: '... (Displays her work)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hmm... This isn't too bad, right? I knew I could do it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Knocking—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: 'Ayla, I brought a book for you. "The Legend of Art".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Look at my work! How is it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Meka', 3: "It's very nice. You are really good, Ayla.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'You can draw, you can write, and you even sing very well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'I hope one day I can see you shine.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Of course! I won't let you down!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I want everybody to see my artwork and listen to my songs! I want everybody to be happy!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "If you become famous, I'll be delighted.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: 'Right, Ayla. One more thing.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "Tomorrow I'm taking everyone for an outing as usual. Don't forget to prepare.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Great! I've been waiting for this!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Museum of Human Legacy last year, Construct Research Lab the year before...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Where are we going this year?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Meka', 3: "You really can't wait, can you, Ayla? But, no spoilers.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What?! Please!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'Hehehe... According to my sources, we are definitely going to the garden for a picnic!'}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: "What, not again... I don't want to go for a picnic."}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: "Really?! I can't believe there's someone who doesn't like a picnic! God save him!"}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: "You're just making it up. I'm going back—"}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'Wait! Ahem, I admit that a picnic is my personal preference. But!'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: "This is highly classified information. I'm only telling you because you are my friend! It's the Virtual Convention Center!"}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: 'R-really? Are you saying that...'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: "Yeah, that's right! Virtual reality games, baby!"}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: "I won't be able to fall asleep tonight...! Why did you have to tell me..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Huh? Are games really that fun?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'Oh, hi, Ayla.'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: "You girls may not know much about games. But if you get to play the game, you'll probably understand how exciting it is!"}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'Imagine you are a powerful Construct, going to an unknown space full of danger.'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'In your left hand is a sci-fi energy beam weapon, in your right hand is a laser sword.'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'Three alien monsters suddenly appear in front of you—slash! Pew pew!'}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'One hit, one kill. Then you finish them all with one beam! Bang! How cool is that!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm... I can imagine that scene. And I should be able to draw it down...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: "You're a great painter, but you need to actually play it to get the gist."}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: "Even if you draw it, there's no point... A picture alone can't bring the battlefield to you."}
{2: 'Fat Boy', 3: 'Ayla the Great Artist lives in a pure and innocent world. Leave the battlefield to us brave warriors!'}
{2: 'Lazy Boy', 3: "Ooh! I-I'm feeling excited too!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Pure and innocent... Huh.', 4: '1'}
